name: Dead by Daylight - The Last Breath Chapter
summary:
"The Last Breath is the first Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It provides a glimpse of the effect of insanity in its purest and most violent form, as players gets to visit the asylum Crotus Prenn. You’ll also meet a new Killer, the Nurse, and the Survivor Nea Karlsson. 
 
Wretched minds, screaming in the dark can still be heard late at night. A Nurse with an equally distorted mind as those she treated. A Survivor with catlike movements. And an asylum that nobody left sane...or alive. 
 
The Last Breath is a FREE Chapter for Dead by Daylight and it includes a new Killer, Survivor and a map."

alternative_names.name: Dead by Daylight: The Last Breath Chapter
